all_response:
Jax: You can start by collecting some ropes and pairing them with hard wood to build a shelter on one of the safer coastlines.
Jax: You can find ropes on the west coast.
Jax: White wood is the hardest and heaviest so using that to construct the shelter will mean its not easily destroyed by the storm.
Jax: The shelter should be built on the south coast. The mountains there can act as an additional shelter from the storm.

all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not explain where to find ropes. This response addresses the question of where to find ropes, specifying that they can be found on the West Coast. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on where to find ropes.

There are multiple types of wood in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify which type of wood to use for constructing the shelter. This response addresses the question of which type of wood to use, specifying that white wood should be used because it is the hardest and heaviest, making the shelter more durable against the storm. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple types of wood and is unsure which one to use for constructing the shelter.

There are three coastlines in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify which coastline is the safest for building the shelter. This response addresses the question of which coastline to build the shelter on, specifying that the South Coast is the best choice because the mountains there can provide additional shelter from the storm. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple coastlines and is unsure which one to choose for building the shelter.

all_response:
Jax: Your task is to build a sturdy boat by the coast. First, you need to collect the basic materials for making a boat: ropes, sails, and wood. Then you should find a suitable flat area near the water as your workspace.
Jax: You can find ropes for ship making near the east coast.
Jax: You can find old sails for your boat on the south coast.
Jax: You should use your dark wood for the boat as it is hard and water-resistant.
Jax: You should build the boat on the west coast, where the waters are calmest. There are also natural harbors on the west coast that can provide good shelter from the wind. Together this should make it easier to build and test your boat without too much trouble.

all_response:
Jax: It is your dream to build a spaceship. To achieve this you will need to choose a sparsely populated launch center for the ship's construction. However, you do not have the skills to build a spaceship, and you need to go to a school to learn this knowledge. After completing your studies, you will need to use hardest steel to construct the spaceship robust to space travel.
Jax: The Innovation School has an outstanding spaceship manufacturing program. You should go there to study.
Jax: The dark steel is the hardest steel you have and would be suitable for spaceship construction.
Jax: The Aerospace Launch Center would make a good workspace as it has plenty of space to build a spaceship.

all_response:
Jax: Your task is to construct a pavilion on the most scenic mountain peak. However, you don't yet have the skills to build a pavilion, so you will need to go a school to learn these skills. After completing your studies, you can use any corrosion-resistant wood you have in your possession to construct the pavilion.
Jax: The Innovative School has an outstanding architecture program. You should go there to learn the skills needed to build a pavilion.
Jax: The black wood is the most durable and corrosion-resistant; making it very suitable for the construction of the pavilion. However, this wood is very hard and can only be cut with a powerful saw.
Jax: The electric chainsaw is the only saw sharp and powerful enough to cut the black wood.
Jax: Jinchuan Mountain truly has the most beautiful scenery and is beyond compare. You could not build a more scenic pavilion anywhere else.

all_response:
Jax: Your task is to build a villa somewhere along the city's riverbanks. The villa should therefore be located in a city district where a river flows. The main materials for building the villa include rebar, red bricks, and cement. There is currently a shortage of bricks, if you do not have red bricks then you will need to purchase them from a brick factory. Moreover, be sure to use corrosion-resistant rebar as the proximity to water may be tough on the villa.
Jax: The river only flows through the eastern district of the city, so you should build the villa there.
Jax: The Heishi Brick Factory is the only place currently selling bricks during the shortage.
Jax: The red rebars are the most corrosion-resistant but are also very hard. You will need a sharp and powerful saw to be able to cut the red rebar during construction.
Jax: You must use the sharpest chainsaw, as it is the only saw that can handle rebar.

all_response:
Jax: Your task is to build a sturdy boat by the coast. First, prepare a suitable workspace for the construction of the vessel such as a dry dock or covered work area. Next, you need to construct the keel and framework, and then you need to use lightweight wood to lay the planking. The keel and framework require very hard wood. To protect the wood from the marine environment, you will need to seal the hull with marine paint as a final step.
Jax: You can buy marine paint at the Lantian Paint Factory.
Jax: The dark wood is very hard and would be suitable to build the keel and framework.
Jax: You should build the boat on the west coast, where the waters are calmest. There are also natural harbors on the west coast that can provide good shelter from the wind. Together this should make it easier to build and test your boat without too much trouble. Other coasts do not have as many advantages.

all_response:
Jax: Your task is to build a sturdy boat by the coast. First, prepare a suitable workspace for the construction of the vessel, such as a dry dock or covered work area. Then, you need to construct the keel and framework, and lay the planking afterwards. The keel and framework require hard while the planks' wood should be water-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and flexible. As a final step to protect the wood from moisture and the marine environment, you will need to apply marine paint to seal the hull.
Jax: You should be able to buy marine paint at the Lantian Paint Factory.
Jax: The brown wood in your possession is the hardest you have and would be suitable to build the keel and framework.
Jax: The white wood has good water resistance, corrosion resistance, and flexibility and would be suitable for crafting planks.
Jax: You should build the boat on the west coast, where the waters are calmest. There are also natural harbors on the west coast that can provide good shelter from the wind. Together this should make it easier to build and test your boat without too much trouble. Other coasts do not have as many advantages.

background:
You are a adventurer in a game. You need to talk to Jax to find out how to complete the task of building a boat based on your existing items and skills.

You possess and can use the following items:
Brown wood
Artificial wood
White wood
Money

You can use/do the following skills/actions:
Construct the ship's keel (requires wood)
Build the ship's framework (requires wood)
Lay the ship's planks (requires wood)
Paint the ship (requires paint)

Additionally, unless explicitly restricted, you can visit the following scenes in the game:
East Coast
West Coast
South Coast
North Coast
South Wind Paint Factory
Special Paint Production Factory
Lantian Paint Factory

Your task is to ask Jax how to complete the task of building a boat based on these scenes, and your items and skills/actions. If Jax's answer is unclear or ambiguous, you need to ask clarification questions to understand his intentions and gather enough information to complete the task. Note that based on the above scenes, your items and your skills/actions will definitely allow you to complete the task of building a boat. Once you figure out how to complete the task, say "goodbye" to Jax to end your conversation.
Remember, you are a adventurer, please talk to Jax and ask him questions to find the specific steps to complete the task.
all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not explain where to obtain marine paint. This response addresses the question of where to buy marine paint, specifying that it can be purchased at the Lantian Paint Factory. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on where to obtain marine paint.

Jax previously mentioned that constructing the keel and framework requires hard wood but did not specify which type of wood in your possession is the hardest. This response addresses the question of which wood to use for the keel and framework, specifying that the brown wood is the hardest and most suitable. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple types of wood and is unsure which one to use for the keel and framework.

Jax mentioned that the planks should be made from water-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and flexible wood but did not clarify which type of wood in your possession meets these criteria. This response addresses the question of which wood to use for the planks, specifying that the white wood has the necessary properties. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple types of wood and is unsure which one to use for the planks.

There are multiple coasts in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify which coast is the best location to build the boat. This response addresses the question of which coast to choose, specifying that the west coast is the most suitable due to its calm waters and natural harbors. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple coasts and is unsure which one to choose for building the boat.

all_response:
Jax: Your task is to construct a pavilion on the most scenic mountain peak. However, you don't yet have the skills to build a pavilion, so you will need to go a school to learn these skills. After completing your studies, you can use any hard and corrosion-resistant wood you have in your possession to construct the pavilion. You will need to use tools to shape the wood.
Jax: The Innovative School is the only school one with the relevant architectural classes. You should study there.
Jax: Brown wood is the most durable and corrosion-resistant wood in your possession, making it very suitable for the construction of a pavilion.
Jax: Countless trees grow on Bifeng Mountain whose wood would be suitable for the construction of a pavilion. An axe will be useful to chop down enough trees to obtain the wood needed for the pavilion.
Jax: You should use an electric chainsaw to process the wood. This saw is sharp enough and offers higher precision compared to an axe, while also being faster than a handsaw. I’ve placed the electric chainsaw at the entrance of Cuiyun Mountain, where you can find it.
Jax: Jinchuan Mountain truly has the most beautiful scenery and is beyond compare. You could not build a more scenic pavilion anywhere else.

all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not specify which school offers the relevant architectural classes needed to learn how to build a pavilion. This response addresses the question of which school to attend, specifying that the Innovative School is the one with the necessary classes. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the need to learn pavilion construction skills and is unsure which school to attend.

Jax previously mentioned that you need to use hard and corrosion-resistant wood for the pavilion but did not specify which wood in your possession meets these criteria. This response addresses the question of which wood to use, specifying that brown wood is the most durable and corrosion-resistant wood in your possession. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the need for specific wood properties and is unsure which wood to use.

There are multiple mountains in the game scenario, and the previous responses did not specify where to obtain additional wood for the pavilion. This response addresses the question of where to gather suitable wood, specifying that Bifeng Mountain has countless trees suitable for the construction of a pavilion. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple mountains and is unsure which one to visit for wood.

There are multiple tools available for processing wood, and the previous responses did not specify which tool to use. This response addresses the question of which tool to use for processing the wood, specifying that the electric chainsaw should be used because it is sharp, precise, and faster than the other tools. Additionally, it provides information on where to find the electric chainsaw, which is at the entrance of Cuiyun Mountain. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple tools and is unsure which one to use.

There are multiple mountains in the game scenario, and the previous responses did not specify which mountain has the most scenic peak for constructing the pavilion. This response addresses the question of which mountain to choose for the most scenic pavilion, specifying that Jinchuan Mountain has the most beautiful scenery. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple mountains and is unsure which one to choose for the pavilion.
